data.title: HealthShare Referral Manager (HSRM) Support Points of Contact
data.meta_description: Various points of contact for different topics related to HSRM.
data.text:
The purpose of this page is to provide various points of contact you can reach out to regarding your use of HealthShare Referral Manager (HSRM).

ID.me Support

VA Medical Center Points of Contact

An important part of the HSRM registration process involves coordinating with your VA medical center (VAMC) partner(s) to let them know when you have received your HSRM account and are ready to begin processing referrals in the system.

The tables below provide points of contact for each VAMC, organized geographically. Please reach out to the point of contact for each VAMC you partner with to coordinate on the items mentioned in the list above.

View an interactive map of VA VISNs.

To request updates to the listings below, email the CCRA Team.

VISN 1: VA New England Healthcare System

Contact List for VISN 1 HSRM Station Station# Contact Contact Email Bedford, MA 518 Gail Scalese gail.scalese@va.gov Sandra D'Amico sandra.d'amico@va.gov Manchester, NH 608 Dr. Brian Phemester brian.phemester@va.gov Donald Falkowski donald.falkowski@va.gov Charleen Eaton charleen.eaton@va.gov Leeds, MA
